constituent: reflect, sun, day, centre, center, large, St. Bernard
koohiiStory1: In the solar system, the Sun is the central source of all light, everything else just reflects it.
koohiiStory2: A solar power plant consists of thousands of mirrors reflecting the sun´s rays, concentrating the energy on a focal point at the centre. See here: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_Two.
kunYomi: うつ.る、うつ.す、は.える、-ば.え
readingExamples: 映す (うつ.す), 映る (うつ.る), 映える (は.える)
words: to shine, to look attractive, to look pretty
